title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs, streaming chat and embedding methods.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, generate, pull and delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that adds fuzzy model search, progress bars and shell completions to the native Ollama CLI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to call Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose recipes for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) deployments plus Open WebUI stack.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval and generation.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack bot that answers channel questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” commands for summarizing notes or Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate with async/await support for chat, generate and embeddings.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community effort to catalog custom GGUF models and Modelfiles optimized for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into Discord threads.
